mapper.select: SELECT rec_no, book_title, book_author, book_isbn, book_cover, book_pubDate, book_publisher FROM recommend_book WHERE recommend_date between concat(#{date.year}, '-', #{date.month}, '-01') AND concat(#{date.year}, '-', #{date.month}, '-31' ) ORDER BY rec_no DESC LIMIT #{cri.skip}, #{cri.amount}
